title: Current Affairs Practice Mock Test | 7 Oct 2023

quiz.text: Recently (August-2023), the Union Cabinet, chaired by Hon’ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, today approved the expansion of the Digital India programme. Total outlay is ____.
options: (A) ₹20,903 crores
(B) ₹16,903 crores
(C) ₹14,903 crores
(D) ₹10,903 crores
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to National Agriculture Market (e-NAM) Scheme? 1. To promote better marketing opportunities for farmers / sellers through online access to more buyers / markets, removal of information asymmetry between farmer and trader is one of the objectives.
2. It aims to promote stable prices and availability of quality produce to consumers. 3. National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) is acting as Lead Implementing Agency.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 1 and 3
(C) 2 and 3
(D) Only 1
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Pradhan Mantri Vandhan Yojana (PMVDY)?
options: (A) Self Help Groups (SHG) should belong to contiguous area, preferably in same or near-by villages.
(B) Preference to be given to convergence with functional SHGs promoted under Aajeevika Mission  with majority tribal members
(C) More than one member from one household can be part of SHG.
(D) A typical Van Dhan Vikas Kendra shall constitute of 15 tribal Van Dhan Vikas Self Help Groups (SHG), each comprising of upto 20 MFP gatherers
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect eligibility under PM Vishwakarma Scheme?
options: (A) Minimum age should be 21 years on date of registration.
(B) Person should be engaged in trade concerned on date of registration.
(C) Registration and benefits restricted to 1 member of family.
(D) Person in government service and his/her family members is not eligible.
(E) Family defined as consisting of husband, wife and unmarried children.

quiz.text: According to the Annual report of fisheries 2022-23, the fisheries sector of India has shown an impressive growth rate of _____ during the year 2015-16 to 2020-21.
options: 7.36%
7.98%
8.53%
9.03%
None of the above

quiz.text: India’s First Lighthouse Festival has recently (September 2023) begun in which of the following states?
options: Tamil Nadu
Kerala
Karnataka
Goa
Maharashtra

quiz.text: Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to New India Literacy Programme?1.  Critical life skills (including financial literacy, digital literacy, legal literacy, health care etc) to be imparted.2. Age cohort of 15-45 to be saturated first followed by ages 45 and above.3. It aims to impart Vocational skills development (as part of continuous learning process for obtaining local employment, reskilling and upskilling).
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
Only 2
1 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following organizations has recently (September 2023) released the report mentioned in the above passage?
options: World Bank and the United Nations Population Fund
Asian Development Bank and the United Nations Population Fund
International Institute for Population Sciences and the United Nations Population Fund
International Institute for Population Sciences and World Bank
International Institute for Population Sciences and Asian Development Bank

quiz.text: World Bamboo Day is marked annually on _______
options: September 29th
September 23rd
September 15th
September 28th
September 18th

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to PLI Scheme for Millet-based Products (PLISMBP)?
options: (A) Objective is to increase usage of millets in food products and promote its value addition
(B) Packaged and Branded Ready to Cook/Ready to Eat (RTC/RTE) food products in consumer packs with more than 15% of millets by weight/ volume in product composition are eligible
(C) Primary processed millet commodities like de-husked/ polished millet grains, colour sorted millet grains and Millet Flours/ Atta are also included
(D) PLI Scheme for Millet-based Products (PLISMBP) launched utilizing savings under Production Linked Incentive Scheme for Food Processing Industry (PLISFPI)
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: India's first largest indigenous Nuclear Power Plant, with a capacity of 700 Megawatts started its operations at full capacity recently (August 2023). Which of the following Nuclear Power Plant matches with the above description?
options: Narora Atomic Power Station
Kaiga Nuclear Power Plant
Tarapur Atomic Power Station
Kudankulam Nuclear Power Plant
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), GM mustard was in news. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct regarding GM mustard? a. DMH-11 is an indigenously developed transgenic mustard. It is a genetically modified variant of herbicide-tolerant (HT) mustard.b. This is a result of a cross between the Indian mustard variety ‘Varuna’ and East European ‘Early Heera-2’ mustard.c. It contains two alien genes (‘barnase’ and ‘barstar’) isolated from a soil bacterium called Bacillus amyloliquefaciens that enable breeding of high-yielding commercial mustard hybrids.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Prime Minister’s Development Initiative for North East Region (PM-DevINE)?
1. Ministry of Tribal Affairs is the Nodal Ministry of the scheme. 
2. It provides support to isolated projects instead of end-to-end development solution.
3. Complements existing Government of India and State Government initiatives, avoiding duplication by supporting projects not covered elsewhere.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 3
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 2 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: India's first long-range side swing revolver, known as 'Prabal,' is manufactured by which organization and is capable of hitting targets accurately up to what range?
options: Organization:Advanced Weapons and Equipment India (AWEIL), Kanpur & Range: 50 meters
Organization: National Armament Corporation (NAC), Delhi & Range: 100 meters
Organization: Indian Firearms Manufacturing Corporation (IFMC), Mumbai & Range: 25 meters
Organization: Ministry of Defence (MoD), New Delhi & Range: 75 meters

Organization: Ordnance Factory Chandigarh & Range: 40 meters

Top of Form

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), project on DNA testing of cotton was in news.  Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct in this regard?a. The project for development and to promote DNA testing of cotton in the country will be initiated in collaboration with Council of Scientific and Industrial Research-National Botanical Research Institute (CSIR-NBRI).b. The project aims to develop genetic markers for precise discrimination of both inter-and intra-species cotton varieties and to establish protocol for extraction of DNA from the different stages of cotton textiles c. DNA testing facility would be a big step towards Atmanirbhar Bharat, since it will be first of its kind in the country.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana?
1. Senior citizens with monthly income not more than ₹10000 are of the target beneficiaries.
2. Loss of teeth is of the disabilities/infirmities covered under Yojana.
3. Responsibility of funding lies with the state governments.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 2 and 3
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 3
(E) 1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has launched which of the following mobile applications as a one-stop repository of essential information for National Highway users?
options: Travel-buddy
Vaahan
Rajmargyatra
Parivahan
Yatra Sahyogi

quiz.text: Consider the following statements regarding the 'A-HELP' (Accredited Agent for Health and Extension of Livestock Production) programme:a. The 'A-HELP' program focuses on empowering women by training them as agents who contribute to disease control, artificial insemination, animal tagging, and livestock insurance. b. This approach recognizes the significant role of women in the comprehensive development of the livestock sector, particularly in Gujarat.c. The Pashudhan Jagrati Abhiyaan includes workshops, awareness camps, seminars, and practical training sessions conducted by State Veterinary Universities in collaboration with State Animal Husbandry Departments.Choose the correct answer from the following options:
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM)?

1. Community needs to contribute 5% or 10% of capital cost for in-village infrastructure as the case may be, in cash/ kind/ and/ or labour.

2. Every village to prepare a Village Action Plan (VAP) which will have two components.

3. Technological interventions to be provided for removal of contaminants where water quality is an issue.

4. Greywater (industrial wastewater) management is also covered under Village Action Plan (VAP).
options: (A) Only 1, 2 and 3
(B) Only 1 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 4
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: The ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 official anthem has recently (September 2023) been released with the title _____________.
options: Dil Utsav Manaye
Dil Jashn Bole
Dil Khushi Gaaye
Dil Masti Rang
Dil Bahaar Nache

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), World Coffee Conference (WCC) was in news. In this regard, which of the following statement(s) is/are correct regarding International Coffee Organization (ICO)?a. It is a body set up in 1963 under the auspices of the United Nations to boost the economic importance of coffee globally.b. It is the only inter-governmental organization for coffee and represents 93% of world coffee production and 63% of world consumption.c. India is a member of this organization.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Consider the following statements regarding the recently (September 2023) released report mentioned in the above passage.1. Elderly in India’s population will double by 20502. In India, during 2000 and 2022 elderly grew by 134% 3. In India, during 2022-2050 elderly population will grow at 103%Which of the following statements is/are incorrect?
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
Both 1 and 2
Both 2 and 3

quiz.text: The visionary Indian designer, _______ recently (Sep 2023) honoured with the Chevalier de l’Ordre des Arts et des Lettres (Knight of the Order of Arts and Letters) by the French government. He was the first Indian guest designer to participate in the Paris Haute Couture Week in 2020.
options: Wendell Rodricks
Rahul Mishra
Manish Arora
Ritu Beri
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), BIS has published IS 18267: 2023 specification code for which of the following products that aims at reducing plastic pollution and promoting sustainability?
options: Packaging containers used for fisheries products
storage containers used for agri products
Packaging bags used for transportation of agri products
Food serving utensils made from agri by products
None of the above

quiz.text: Consider the following statements regarding the recently (September 2023), released Global Innovation Index (GII) mentioned in the above passage.1. Index is topped by the Sweden with a score of 67.6 2. India has been ranked at the 40th Spot with a score of 38.13. Last rank has been given to the Niger, with a score of 10.3Which of the following statements is/are incorrect?
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
Both 1 and 3
Both 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023) former Chief Justice of India (CJI) ______ has been appointed as member of the International Mediator Panel of Singapore International Mediation Centre (SIMC).
options: U. U. Lalit
Sharad Arvind Bobde
Dipak Misra
Ranjan Gogoi
N. V. Ramana

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023) The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) has recognized the mithun as a ‘food animal,’ opening doors for its commercial use. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct regarding Mithun?a. Mithun or Gayal, scientifically known as Bos frontalis, a ruminant species of the Bovidae family, is a remarkable bovine species native to the lush and hilly regions of Northeast India. b. It is also the state animal of both Arunachal Pradesh and Assam. c. Often referred to as the “Cattle of the Hills,” Mithun holds significant cultural, economic, and ecological importance in this region.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), Surfshark released the “The 5th Digital Quality of Life (DQL) Index”. Its findings are based on 5 core pillars, which one of the following is not one of them?
options: Internet Availability
Internet quality
Internet affordability
e-security
e-infrastructure

quiz.text: “Sago” which was recently (September 2023) granted a GI tag is derived from the roots of ___________.
options: Potato
Sweetpotato
Tapioca
Turnips
Taro

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), India has allowed the export of non-basmati white rice to the tune of 75,000 tonnes to which of the following countries?
options: Nepal
Bhutan
UAE
Myanmar
None of the above

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, during 2021-22, agricultural exports reached an all-time high of ___________.
options: USD 75.6 billion
USD 60.4 billion
USD 55.8 billion
USD 50.2 billion
USD 45.7 billion

quiz.text: As per National Education Policy 2020, states will prepare an implementation plan for attaining universal foundational literacy and numeracy in all primary schools for all learners by grade 3 by which of the following years?
options: 2030
2025
2026
2032
2028

quiz.text: Identify the correct statement(s) regarding Pradhan Mantri Tuberculosis (TB) Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan?a) It was launched in 2022b) The initiative intends to augment community involvement in meeting India’s commitment to end TB by 2030c) The minimum period to provide additional support to a TB period shall be one year
options: only a
only b
both a and c
both a and b
only c

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to eSanjeevani initiative seen in the news recently (July 2023)?
options: It was launched in 2019 by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.
It is a national doctor to doctor telemedicine service that strives to provide an alternative to the conventional physical consultations via digital platform.
It is to be implemented under National Rural Health Mission (NRHM).
eSanjeevani is a cohesive part of Ayushman Bharat Digital Health Mission (ABDHM).
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements are correct with respect to Project AMBER?a) The Project is co-funded by the Ministry of Labour and Employmentb) The Project is implemented under SANKALP Programmec) The Project aims to train 30,000 youth, 50% of whom will be women.
options: only a
only b
only c
only and b
only b and c

quiz.text: As per recent (June 2023) news, ____________ has won the contract for running and maintaining the government’s portal for public procurement Government e-Marketplace (GeM).
options: Intellect Design Arena
Birlasoft
Infosys
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
Wipro

quiz.text: The 'Travel for LiFE' program seen in the news recently (Sep 2023) launched by the Ministry of Tourism (MoT) in collaboration with multiple organizations. Which one of the following is not one of them?
options: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC)
The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
World Tourism Organization (UNWTO)
The United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
None of the above

quiz.text: The Rural WASH Partners' Forum (RWPF), a platform of Department of Drinking Water & Sanitation (DDWS), Ministry of Jal Shakti, for Development and Sector Partners working in the rural WASH sector in India, is celebrating its 1st anniversary with a two-day National Conference on 21st July 2023 at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi. _______ India plays the role of Platform Coordinator and facilitates the successful organization of dialogue platforms/events in conjunction with DDWS and other stakeholders.
options: Deloitte
PwC
KPMG
Ernst & Young
BCG

quiz.text: The ________ is a proposed sea route between the Indian port of ________ and the Russian port of Vladivostok. The corridor is estimated to bring down transportation time between Indian and Russian ports in the Far East Region by up to 16 days.
options: Arctic Maritime Route, Kolkata
Eastern Maritime Corridor (EMC), Chennai
Northern Sea Route (NSR), Mumbai
Northern Sea Route (NSR), Chennai
Eastern Maritime Corridor (EMC), Mumbai

quiz.text: Identify correct statement with respect to recently (Sep 2023) passed Nari Shakti Vandan Adhiniyam-
options: The Bill reserves 33% of all seats for women in Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha.
The Bill reserves 33% of all seats for women in state legislative assemblies and state legislative Councils.
33% of the total number of seats reserved for SCs and Sts and OBCs shall be reserved for women of those groups.
The reservation will be provided for a period of 15 years.
The reservation of seats will be effective from 2024 General elections.
